title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 29.1 - Licensing requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 29.1 - Licensing requirements

State Regulations

No tank truck collecting and transporting milk from bulk
tank installations on dairy farms shall be operated unless the owner or
operator thereof is licensed pursuant to section
257
of the Agriculture and Markets Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
29.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
